ygData.subject: Mage armour
ygData.msgSnippet: Best defence is a strong offence but when this fail what remain ? -  agility it is life saver if he dont hit you he cant dammage you! -  armours cloth armour
ygData.messageBody:
Best defence is a strong offence but when this fail what remain ?

- agility it is life saver if he dont hit you he cant dammage you!
- armours
cloth armour is base armour found a many low lw MOBs like orc pawns, cents
some skeletons
netted armour is found on many froglocks and is lower waight then cloth
with same protection
wowen armour is better then netted and can be found on some froglocks but
also weight more
mesh armour is like leather and same as woven but lower weight and also
demask armour befalen lower end guys have it and najena
g......... armour can be won in najena
s.... s..... is beter jet as it also give some magic bonuses
l..... armour is similar but takes much more time to get
Finaly B... D..... S.... Armour make you look and feel realy great with a
resistence and a other magic adds make you

- last line of defense can be some escape spells or sacrifical pets but
escape spells are very very unstable so it is realy emergence and when you
dont have any other hope that you can use them. Fade and shadow step is
some of this spells but from my experience after using this spell you
finish dead as it teleports you 10 cm. from monster and before you can run
from it again he is on you and gul..p.. mmrr..


Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)


http://www.tip.it/wizard
